wikipedia_page.main: David Edward Coote (born 8 April 1955) is a former English cricketer.  Coote was a left-handed batsman.  He was born at Winkburn, Nottinghamshire.

response: David Coote is an English football referee. He is a member of the Nottinghamshire Football Association.
Coote is the son of David Coote who played cricket for Nottinghamshire County Cricket Club.
